remarks: Version of ~ marypha1 using a functional family of sets instead of a relation.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Feb-2015.)
statement:
marypha2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
marypha2.b $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> Fin ) $.
marypha2.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ d C_ A ) -> d ~<_ U. ( F " d ) ) $.
marypha2 $p |- ( ph -> E. g ( g : A -1-1-> _V /\ A. x e. A ( g ` x ) e. ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
$d A d g x $.
$d F d g x $.
$d d g ph x $.
